Path for register a new user with general form inputs without using oauth token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","title":"Email","description":"User's email address.","examples":["user@example.com"]},"username":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","maxLength":30,"minLength":3},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Username","description":"Optional username, must be alphanumeric."},"password":{"type":"string","minLength":8,"title":"Password","description":"Password must be at least 8 characters."},"confirm_password":{"type":"string","title":"Confirm Password","description":"Password confirmation, must match the password."}},"type":"object","required":["email","password","confirm_password"],"title":"UserRegisterRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean","title":"Success","default":true},"message":{"type":"string","title":"Message","default":"User successfully registered. Please check your email for verification link."}},"type":"object","title":"UserRegisterResponse"}}}},"409":{"description":"The user already exists","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"errors":{"items":{"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","title":"Title"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Msg"}},"type":"object","required":["title","msg"],"title":"GenericErrorDetail","description":"Describes a single generic error."},"type":"array","title":"Errors"}},"type":"object","required":["errors"],"title":"GenericErrorResponse","description":"The complete response body for general HTTP errors (e.g., 404, 500)."}}}},"422":{"description":"The user was not have correct request.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"errors":{"items":{"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","title":"Title"},"source":{"type":"string","title":"Source"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Msg"}},"type":"object","required":["title","source","msg"],"title":"ValidationErrorDetail","description":"Describes a single validation error, including the source field."},"type":"array","title":"Errors"}},"type":"object","required":["errors"],"title":"ValidationErrorResponse","description":"The complete response body for a 422 Unprocessable Entity error."}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"errors":{"items":{"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","title":"Title"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Msg"}},"type":"object","required":["title","msg"],"title":"GenericErrorDetail","description":"Describes a single generic error."},"type":"array","title":"Errors"}},"type":"object","required":["errors"],"title":"GenericErrorResponse","description":"The complete response body for general HTTP errors (e.g., 404, 500)."}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
